name: First Baptist Church Somerset
description: First Baptist Church Somerset is a historic Baptist church serving the Somerset-Pulaski County community since 1799. The church offers two Sunday morning worship services: Contemporary Worship at 9am and Traditional Worship at 11am, plus Wednesday evening services at 6pm. Services include children's programs, youth ministry, adult Bible studies, and various community outreach programs. The church provides spiritual guidance, counseling, and community support services.
source: Verified from official website and contact information
services: Sunday Worship Services (9am & 11am), Wednesday Evening Services (6pm), Children's Programs, Youth Ministry, Bible Studies, Community Outreach
notes: Historic church established in 1799. Offers contemporary and traditional worship services. Provides building rental for community events. Active on social media platforms including Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.
